attributes.action: rule by law to order all M.Ps who have taken advantage of the rules on expences to return any monies received not in the spirit of thr rules by the end of 2009 or else be punished with punitive damages.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
